Name: 史莱姆冒险战SlimeWarfare
About the game: 'Slime Warfare'is a rogue tower defense game with a variety of gameplay and placement. Slimes are weak monsters and always bullied by humans. Players will play the role of the Slime Queen to build structures to defend against adventurers' attacks and strengthen themselves. Slime and Adventurer According to legend, slimes are very weak creatures. This is a fight between slimes and adventurers, destroy the invading adventurers and defend the slime! randomness and decision making Choose the tower you need from the towers drawn at random. You can choose an attack-type tower to increase your attacking units, or you can choose a buff-type tower to strengthen your attacking units. Various combinations Arrange towers anywhere on the map to form your own lineup. Then combine the cards to create your unique formation and genre. road planning During the game you can pave your own path. According to the progress of each game time you can get the number of road tiles that you can lay. During the game, you can change the layout of the road at will to assist your strategy. Strengthen and upgrade You can upgrade your attack towers and Slime Queens after each game to guard every dungeon.
